summary: Retrieve detailed performance metrics for a customer engagement task, including message reads, order conversions, and other key engagement statistics
description:
Retrieve detailed performance metrics for a customer engagement task, including message reads, order conversions, and other key engagement statistics. Version
202412
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response.  Get by API Get Authorization Shop
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

Shop_cipher is required for cross-border shops, and optional for local shops. It's unique for each shop. Get the this property from the Get Authorized Shop API dynamically. Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

body.description: The list of tasks for which you want to retrieve performance data.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: The requested list of task performance.
The status of the task. Possible values: SENDING FAILED CANCELED SUCCESS
The number of users that received the message.
The number of users that read the message.
The number of orders resulting from the message.
The revenue from the converted orders.
